remarks: An associative law for division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divassd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
divassd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) / C ) = ( A x. ( B / C ) ) ) $.
